original_title: The Go-Go Boys: The Inside Story of Cannon Films
overview: Cousins Menahem Golan and Yoram Globus relive the creation, rise and fall of their independent film company, Cannon Films. This documentary recounts their many successes and discusses their eventual downfall.
tagline: They made movies, talked a great game and put showmanship back into show business
title: The Go-Go Boys: The Inside Story of Cannon Films
